
âœ… STEP 1: Create the BAT Launcher
ğŸ“ Go to the folder where your compiled .exe lives (e.g., C:\Users\Skipper\ImaanGuard\dist\).

ğŸ“„ Create a new file named:
launch_imaan.bat

ğŸ“ Contents:

@echo off
cd /d "C:\Users\Skipper\ImaanGuard\dist"
start "" "ImaanGuard.exe"
âš ï¸ Replace the path above with your actual full path to the folder where ImaanGuard.exe is.

âœ… STEP 2: Set Up Task Scheduler (ON LOGON)
ğŸ“Œ Open PowerShell (with Admin rights) and paste this beast:


schtasks /Create `
  /TN "ImaanGuardBoot" `
  /TR "C:\Users\Skipper\ImaanGuard\dist\launch_imaan.bat" `
  /SC ONLOGON `
  /RL HIGHEST `
  /F


âœ… STEP 3: Test It Right Now (No reboot needed)
ğŸ’£ Try it manually:

	schtasks /Run /TN "ImaanGuardBoot"


Your app should launch â€” boom ğŸ’¥
